entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS: FlyoutItemImageStyle breaks selection of first item on startup #20435
  • Problems when sharing an image #20434
  • CollectionView is Very Laggy #20433
  • Cannot change <MauiVersion> in .csproj #20431
  • [Testing] Break up Core tests by Category #20429
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Dependency injection fails for Android #20428
  • Deployment of App in Release mode on local iPhone uses type UIKit.UISceneSessionActivationRequest and therefore breaks with iOS 16.2 #20424
  • Bug in ICanvas.GetStringSize when called with default font #20419
  • [BUG] Content of a ContentPage doesn't occupy full height when page is pushed to PrismNavigationPage #20418
  • ListView Control Behaviour Broken #20416
  • `ColorTypeConverter` omits alpha channel when converting to string #20411
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]The monkey's location information is too long to be fully displayed. #20410
  • Flaky tests in windows with some controls #20409
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Window was already activated #20408
  • Bottom and right side of Border are cut off when layout size changes #20407
  • A possible use case for contentRootRelativePath being overridable #20405

Closed

  • MAUI Blazor app crashes during startup on MacBook M1 #20426
  • UseMauiMaps doesn't work if called before ConfigureFonts #16736
    Backlog
  • Not able to update CollectionView header #19379
    .NET 8 SR3
  • iOS/Catalyst memory leak with CollectionView when CollectionChanged is used #16125
    Backlog
  • Android splashscreen SVG not shown #16159
    Backlog
  • Blazor hybrid app and "error CS5001: Program does not contain a static 'Main' method suitable for an entry point" #20329

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Use AzurePipelines for testing templates #20436
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net 9.0 #20427
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating back #20420
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, area/gestures
  • [Trimming] Disable assembly scanning for types implementing IVisual #20417
  • Add support for relative binding sources to TypedBinding #20415
    area/Xaml </>
  • [C] ColorTypeConverter include alpha when <1 #20414
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • Bring back some aspect of ConvertView on TableView and avoid AT_MOST Measure #20130
    area/ListView
  • [xharness] Add timeout #20432
  • [iOS] Fixed Collection View header and footer update #20210
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, .NET 8 SR3
  • Update GitInfo.txt to 8_0_10 #20423
  • [tests] Use public pool for iOS device and uitests #20421
    testing-flakiness
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁
  • Ignore SafeArea on templates and shell flyout item templates #20403
  • Move Legacy ListViewDoesntFreezeApp to Appium #20400

Updated

  • Remove cleanup for CI Builds #20395
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] `dotnet format src/Core/src/Core.csproj` #20388
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • `dotnet format src/Core/src/Core.csproj` #20387
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, stale
  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • Fix Windows device tests #20401
  • Fix design time image converter #20374
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [iOS] Add iOS17 tests again #19941
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/testing
  • [iOS] Figure a better EstimatedItemSize for HorizontalList #20022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [.NET 9] Reconcile all NET8 //TODO Add this API comments #19996
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/architecture
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [iOS] Fixes carouselview layout on iOS #20001
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area/Xaml </>
  • Update SecureStorage.android.cs #20293
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [XC] only generate the services that'll be used #19945
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • [Trimming] Add new API to create TypedBindings from expression #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add the multi-project template #20365
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 SR3
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
